sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO WX_MSG_MEDIA (ID, TITLE , DESCRIPTION , MUSICURL , HQMUSICURL , FUNCFLAG , AUTHOR , AUTHOR_ID , CREATED , LAST_MODIFIED , LAST_MODIFY_ID , SORT_ID ) VALUES (#id#, #title# , #description# , #musicurl# , #hqmusicurl# , #funcflag# , #author# , #authorId# , #created# , #lastModified# , #lastModifyId# , #sortId# )

INSERT INTO WX_MSG_MEDIA (ID, TITLE , DESCRIPTION , MUSICURL , HQMUSICURL , FUNCFLAG , AUTHOR , AUTHOR_ID , CREATED , LAST_MODIFIED , LAST_MODIFY_ID , SORT_ID ) VALUES (_nextval('WX_MSG_MEDIA'), #title# , #description# , #musicurl# , #hqmusicurl# , #funcflag# , #author# , #authorId# , #created# , #lastModified# , #lastModifyId# , #sortId# )
SELECT _currval('WX_MSG_MEDIA') as id
sqlMap.update: update WX_MSG_MEDIA set TITLE = #title# , DESCRIPTION = #description# , MUSICURL = #musicurl# , HQMUSICURL = #hqmusicurl# , FUNCFLAG = #funcflag# , AUTHOR = #author# , AUTHOR_ID = #authorId# , CREATED = #created# , LAST_MODIFIED = #lastModified# , LAST_MODIFY_ID = #lastModifyId# , SORT_ID = #sortId# where ID=#id#
sqlMap.select: select count(*) from (select ID id , TITLE title , DESCRIPTION description , MUSICURL musicurl , HQMUSICURL hqmusicurl , FUNCFLAG funcflag , AUTHOR author , AUTHOR_ID authorId , CREATED created , LAST_MODIFIED lastModified , LAST_MODIFY_ID lastModifyId , SORT_ID sortId from WX_MSG_MEDIA) t

select ID id , TITLE title , DESCRIPTION description , MUSICURL musicurl , HQMUSICURL hqmusicurl , FUNCFLAG funcflag , AUTHOR author , AUTHOR_ID authorId , CREATED created , LAST_MODIFIED lastModified , LAST_MODIFY_ID lastModifyId , SORT_ID sortId from WX_MSG_MEDIA t order by sortid

select ID id , TITLE title , DESCRIPTION description , MUSICURL musicurl , HQMUSICURL hqmusicurl , FUNCFLAG funcflag , AUTHOR author , AUTHOR_ID authorId , CREATED created , LAST_MODIFIED lastModified , LAST_MODIFY_ID lastModifyId , SORT_ID sortId from WX_MSG_MEDIA t where t.ID=#id#

select * from (select ID id , TITLE title , DESCRIPTION description , MUSICURL musicurl , HQMUSICURL hqmusicurl , FUNCFLAG funcflag , AUTHOR author , AUTHOR_ID authorId , CREATED created , LAST_MODIFIED lastModified , LAST_MODIFY_ID lastModifyId , SORT_ID sortId from WX_MSG_MEDIA) t
order by $orderByClause$
sqlMap.delete: delete from WX_MSG_MEDIA where ID in (select t.id from (select ID id , TITLE title , DESCRIPTION description , MUSICURL musicurl , HQMUSICURL hqmusicurl , FUNCFLAG funcflag , AUTHOR author , AUTHOR_ID authorId , CREATED created , LAST_MODIFIED lastModified , LAST_MODIFY_ID lastModifyId , SORT_ID sortId from WX_MSG_MEDIA) t )
